text: Marco Pezzaiuoli (born 16 November 1968) is a German professional football manager who is the current head coach of Indian Super League club Bengaluru. == Managerial statistics == Team From To Record Record Record Record Record Record Team From To Karlsruher SC 20 April 2000 30 June 2000 Karlsruher SC 25 September 2002 1 October 2002 Eintracht Trier 20 September 2006 30 October 2006 1899 Hoffenheim 2 January 2011 17 May 2011 Cerezo Osaka 16 June 2014 8 September 2014 J.League Data Site Bengaluru 12 February 2021 Present Total â€” ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:German footballers Category:German football managers Category:Bundesliga managers Category:Karlsruher SC managers Category:TSG 1899 Hoffenheim managers Category:Cerezo Osaka managers
title: Marco Pezzaiuoli
